topic: Relating glare sources in pic file to those in txt output of Evalglare
body:
Hi all,
Is there a way to relate colored glare sources in the .pic file to those
numbered in the txt file generated using evalglare? In other words, the pic
file colors each source with a different color, how do i identify the
corresponding glare source number generated from detailed evalglare output?


Any pointers or suggestions would be appreciated!


Thank you,


Belal Abboushi
___
